entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC

[info] Activation of package dqc_15_concepts.csv, dqc_0011.csv, dqc_0079.csv, dqc_0080.csv, dqc_0081.csv, dqc_0091_ifrs_2018_concepts.csv, dqc_0091_ifrs_2019_concepts.csv, dqc_0094.csv and effective_dates.csv successful. - C:\Users\David\AppData\Local\Temp\tmpxquuf73w\packages\resources.zip

[DQC.US.0081.9277] The line item concept us-gaap:CostOfGoodsAndServicesSold with a value of 4,164,400 is represented as a child of us-gaap:OperatingExpenses with a value of 9,664,122 in the companies extension taxonomy role 00000004 - Statement - Condensed Consolidated Statements of Operations (Unaudited). The element us-gaap:CostOfGoodsAndServicesSold however, is not represented as a component of us-gaap:OperatingExpenses in the calculation relationships defined in the US GAAP taxonomy. The US-GAAP taxonomies include us-gaap:CostOfGoodsAndServicesSold as a sibling element (or child of that sibling) relative to us-gaap:OperatingExpenses in the calculation relationships of the US GAAP taxonomy. Please review the element selection to determine that an appropriate element has been used for the parent element us-gaap:OperatingExpenses and the child element us-gaap:CostOfGoodsAndServicesSold.
The properties of this us-gaap:CostOfGoodsAndServicesSold fact are:
Period :2019-01-01 to 2019-03-31 Dimensions : Unit : USD
Rule Element Id:9277 Rule version: 13.0.0RC1 - http://www.sec.gov/Archives/edgar/data/931059/000149315220013561/rnva-20200331.xml 3172
